author: Brian Turner
method: Mix the mango with the avocado and cherry tomatoes. Add the lime juice, chopped herbs,  red onion and olive oil and mix together. Serve.
ingredients: ½ mango sliced into thin strips,  ½ avocado diced,  4 cherry tomatoes, sliced,  1 lime, juice only,  3 tbsp parsley, chopped,  3 tbsp coriander, chopped,  3 tbsp red onion, diced,  4 tbsp olive oil
